title: Жвачка
overview: Galya is counting the days until she can leave the walls of the orphanage and enter the script department of VGIK. On the Internet, she meets a self-confident and well-off guy Roma. A relationship is formed between them, but the guy does not take Galya seriously: for him, she is another victory, and the girl sticks to him like gum. Roma is ready to do anything to get rid of the obsessive persecution, and comes up with a story of his murder. This frivolous lie turns Gali's life into a nightmare, who is determined to find the killer.…
